wikipedia_page.main: Peter Eric Done is an English billionaire businessman, ‘founder’ and group managing director of Peninsula Business Services, established in 1983.Done was born in Salford, Lancashire, England in February 1947. His wife is Anna Done (m. 1970) and together they have two children.

response: Done grew up with three siblings in Ordsall, Greater Manchester. Done and his brother Peter Done left school aged 15 without qualifications after working in their father’s illegal bookmaking business.
